summary.span: 表示一个程序集，它是一个可重用、无版本冲突并且可自我描述的公共语言运行时应用程序构建基块。

span.span: Represents an assembly, which is a reusable, versionable, and self-describing building block of a common language runtime application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类加载程序集，若要浏览的元数据和构成部分的程序集，发现的类型包含在程序集中，并创建这些类型的实例。Use the class to load assemblies, to explore the metadata and constituent parts of assemblies, to discover the types contained in assemblies, and to create instances of those types. 若要获取的数组对象表示当前程序集加载到应用程序域 （例如，默认应用程序域的一个简单的项目），使用方法。To get an array of objects representing the assemblies currently loaded into an application domain (for example, the default application domain of a simple project), use the method. 若要动态，加载程序集类提供了以下静态方法 (`Shared`方法在 Visual Basic 中的)。To load assemblies dynamically, the class provides the following static methods (`Shared` methods in Visual Basic). 程序集都加载到应用程序域加载操作出现的位置。Assemblies are loaded into the application domain where the load operation occurs. - 加载程序集的建议的方法是使用方法，它标识要按其显示名称加载的程序集 (例如，"System.Windows.Forms、 版本 = 2.0.0.0，区域性 = 中性，PublicKeyToken = b77a5c561934e089")。The recommended way to load assemblies is to use the method, which identifies the assembly to be loaded by its display name (for example, "System.Windows.Forms, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089"). 程序集搜索遵循中所述的规则[运行时如何定位程序集](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md)。The search for the assembly follows the rules described in [How the Runtime Locates Assemblies](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md). - 和方法可加载为反射，而不是执行程序集。The and methods enable you to load an assembly for reflection, but not for execution. 例如，面向 64 位平台的程序集可以由 32 位平台运行的代码进行检查。For example, an assembly that targets a 64-bit platform can be examined by code that is running on a 32-bit platform. - 和方法为在其中必须由路径标识程序集的极少数情况下提供。The and methods are provided for rare scenarios in which an assembly must be identified by path. 若要获取对于当前正在执行的程序集，使用对象方法。To get an object for the currently executing assembly, use the method. 很多成员的类提供有关程序集信息。Many members of the class provide information about an assembly. 例如:For example: - 方法将返回对象，它提供访问的程序集显示名称部分。The method returns an object that provides access to the parts of the assembly display name. - 方法列出了应用于程序集的属性。The method lists the attributes applied to the assembly. - 方法提供对程序集清单中的文件的访问。The method provides access to the files in the assembly manifest. - 方法提供了程序集清单中的资源的名称。The method provides the names of the resources in the assembly manifest. 方法列出的程序集中的所有类型。The method lists all the types in the assembly. 方法列出了对调用方在程序集外部可见的类型。The method lists the types that are visible to callers outside the assembly. 方法可用于搜索的程序集中的特定类型。The method can be used to search for a particular type in the assembly. 方法可用于搜索并在程序集中创建类型的实例。The method can be used to search for and create instances of types in the assembly. 程序集的详细信息，请参阅中的"应用程序域和程序集"一节[应用程序域](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md)主题。For more information on assemblies, see the "Application Domains and Assemblies" section in the [Application Domains](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md) topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取当前正在执行的程序集，创建包含该程序集的某个类型的实例并调用其中一个使用后期绑定的类型的方法。The following code example shows how to obtain the currently executing assembly, create an instance of a type contained in that assembly, and invoke one of the type's methods with late binding. 为此，该代码示例定义一个名为类`Example`，使用一个名为方法`SampleMethod`。For this purpose, the code example defines a class named `Example`, with a method named `SampleMethod`. 类的构造函数接受一个整数，用于计算方法的返回值。The constructor of the class accepts an integer, which is used to compute the return value of the method. 代码示例还演示如何将方法来获取可用于分析的程序集的完整名称的对象。The code example also demonstrates the use of the method to obtain an object that can be used to parse the full name of the assembly. 该示例显示的程序集的版本号属性，并属性。The example displays the version number of the assembly, the property, and the property. [!code-cpp[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果运行时找不到`typeName`中实例，它将返回`null`而不是引发异常。If the runtime is unable to find `typeName` in the instance, it returns `null` instead of throwing an exception. 这可能是因为：This might happen because: - 尚未指定类型的完全限定的名称。You haven't specified the fully qualified name of the type. - 已指定完全限定的类型名称，但其大小写不匹配的类型的大小写属性。You've specified the fully qualified type name, but its case doesn’t match the case of the type's property. 有关不区分大小写的比较`typeName`类型的完整名称，以及调用重载，并指定`true`为`ignoreCase`参数。For a case-insensitive comparison of `typeName` with the type's full name, call the overload and specify `true` for the `ignoreCase` argument. - 中当前不存在类型实例。The type doesn’t exist in the current instance. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`Person`类并调用方法来实例化。The following example defines a `Person` class and calls the method to instantiate it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该方法的调用方法的内联扩展由实时 (JIT) 编译器，或者其调用方是否内联扩展，是该程序集返回可能会发生异常。If the method that calls the method is expanded inline by the just-in-time (JIT) compiler, or if its caller is expanded inline, the assembly that is returned by may differ unexpectedly. 例如，考虑以下方法和程序集：For example, consider the following methods and assemblies: - 方法`M1`程序集中`A1`调用。Method `M1` in assembly `A1` calls . - 方法`M2`程序集中`A2`调用`M1`。Method `M2` in assembly `A2` calls `M1`. - 方法`M3`程序集中`A3`调用`M2`。Method `M3` in assembly `A3` calls `M2`. 当`M1`不是内联返回`A2`。When `M1` is not inlined, returns `A2`. 当`M1`内联，返回`A3`。When `M1` is inlined, returns `A3`. 同样，当`M2`不是内联返回`A2`。Similarly, when `M2` is not inlined, returns `A2`. 当`M2`内联，返回`A3`。When `M2` is inlined, returns `A3`. 这种效果也会发生时`M1`尾调用从作为执行`M2`，或当`M2`尾调用从作为执行`M3`。This effect also occurs when `M1` executes as a tail call from `M2`, or when `M2` executes as a tail call from `M3`. 您可能会阻止从 JIT 编译器内联调用的方法，通过应用属性与标志，但没有任何类似机制来防止尾调用。You can prevent the JIT compiler from inlining the method that calls , by applying the attribute with the flag, but there is no similar mechanism for preventing tail calls. ## Examples 下面的示例获取当前方法的调用程序集。The following example gets the calling assembly of the current method. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CPP/getcallingassembly1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CS/getcallingassembly1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/VB/getcallingassembly1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可返回`null`托管程序集已从非托管应用程序加载。The method can return `null` when a managed assembly has been loaded from an unmanaged application. 例如，如果非托管应用程序创建在 C# 中，调用编写的 COM 组件的实例从 C# 组件的方法将返回 null，因为非托管的代码而不是托管程序集的进程的入口点。For example, if an unmanaged application creates an instance of a COM component written in C#, a call to the method from the C# component returns null, because the entry point for the process was unmanaged code rather than a managed assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅搜索当前程序集实例。This method only searches the current assembly instance. `name`参数包含命名空间而不是程序集。The `name` parameter includes the namespace but not the assembly. 若要搜索的一种类型的其他程序集，请使用方法重载，它可以选择性地包含程序集显示名称作为类型名称的一部分。To search other assemblies for a type, use the method overload, which can optionally include an assembly display name as part of the type name. > [!NOTE] > 如果该类型已转发到另一个程序集，它仍通过此方法返回。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 类型转发的信息，请参阅[公共语言运行时中的类型转发](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个抽象`MeansOfTransportation`类中`Transportation`命名空间。The following example defines an abstract `MeansOfTransportation` class in the `Transportation` namespace. 它将调用方法来检索其对象，调用方法以获取数组的代表的对象类型的属性，并随后在类型上显示信息的抽象属性。It calls the method to retrieve its object, calls the method to get an array of objects that represent the type's properties, and then displays information on the type's abstract properties. 请注意，在调用方法使用该类型的完全限定的名称 （即，其类型名称以及其命名空间）。Note that the call to the method uses the type's fully qualified name (that is, its namespace along with its type name). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅搜索当前程序集实例。This method only searches the current assembly instance. `name`参数包含命名空间而不是程序集。The `name` parameter includes the namespace but not the assembly. 若要搜索的一种类型的其他程序集，请使用方法重载，它可以选择性地包含程序集显示名称作为类型名称的一部分。To search other assemblies for a type, use the method overload, which can optionally include an assembly display name as part of the type name. > [!NOTE] > 如果该类型已转发到另一个程序集，它仍通过此方法返回。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 类型转发的信息，请参阅[公共语言运行时中的类型转发](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). `throwOnError`参数只影响找不到类型时，会发生什么情况。The `throwOnError` parameter only affects what happens when the type is not found. 它不会影响任何其他可能会引发的异常。It does not affect any other exceptions that might be thrown. 具体而言，如果找到但不能加载，类型可能会引发即使`throwOnError`是`false`。In particular, if the type is found but cannot be loaded, can be thrown even if `throwOnError` is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的数组包含嵌套的类型。The returned array includes nested types. 如果程序集和类型上调用方法，该程序集中依赖于尚未加载 （例如，如果它从第二个集中的类型派生），程序集中类型引发。If the method is called on an assembly and a type in that assembly is dependent on a type in an assembly that has not been loaded (for example, if it derives from a type in the second assembly), a is thrown. 例如，这可以以加载的第一个程序集是否或方法和第二个程序集未加载。For example, this can happen if the first assembly was loaded with the or methods, and the second assembly was not loaded. 它也会与程序集使用加载并方法，如果第二个程序集不能定位时调用方法。It can also happen with assemblies loaded using the and methods if the second assembly cannot be located when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 如果一个类型已转发到另一个程序集，它不是包含在返回的数组。If a type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is not included in the returned array. 类型转发的信息，请参阅[公共语言运行时中的类型转发](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). 若要检索的集合而不是一个数组对象对象，请使用属性。To retrieve a collection of objects instead of an array of objects, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例显示的一种方法的参数中指定的程序集的类型上。The following example displays parameters of one method on a type in the specified assembly. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法加载程序集的信任级别是调用程序集的信任级别相同。The trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the calling assembly. 若要从应用程序域的信任级别的字节数组加载程序集，请使用方法重载。To load an assembly from a byte array with the trust level of the application domain, use the method overload. 详细了解使用的证据的重载方法采用字节数组，请参阅方法重载。For more information about the use of evidence with overloads of the method that take byte arrays, see the method overload. 在 c + + 可执行文件上进行反射可能会引发。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 这很可能是由于 c + + 编译器去除重定位地址或`.reloc`从可执行文件的部分。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`地址为 c + + 可执行文件，请指定`/fixed:no`在链接时。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 请注意，此方法的重载始终创建一个新具有其自己的映射对象。Note that this method overload always creates a new object with its own mapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发`assemblyRef`指定完整的程序集名称和匹配的简单名称的第一个程序集具有不同的版本、 区域性或公钥标记。 is thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies the full assembly name and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a different version, culture, or public key token. 加载程序不会继续探测的其他程序集的简单名称相匹配。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. 从.NET Framework 4 开始，因为默认情况下，禁用远程程序集中的代码执行也会引发如果`assemblyRef`指定远程程序集。Starting with .NET Framework 4, because execution of code in remote assemblies is disabled by default, a is also thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies a remote assembly. 若要启用从远程位置加载的代码的执行，可以使用[ `` ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)配置元素。To enable execution of code loaded from remote locations, you can use the [``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) configuration element. > [!NOTE] > 不要使用仅含属性集。Do not use an with only the property set. 属性不提供任何元素 （如名称或版本） 的程序集标识，因此加载不会发生根据负载通过标识规则，正如您期望从方法。The property does not supply any elements of the assembly identity (such as name or version), so loading does not occur according to load-by-identity rules, as you would expect from the method. 相反，使用负载从规则加载程序集。Instead, the assembly is loaded using load-from rules. 使用 load-from 上下文的缺点的信息，请参阅方法重载或[程序集加载的最佳实践](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md)。For information about the disadvantages of using the load-from context, see the method overload or [Best Practices for Assembly Loading](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md). 是否将特定的权限授予程序集是基于证据的。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 程序集和安全证据的合并的规则如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 当你使用方法没有参数，则加载程序提供的证据加载程序集。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 当你使用方法替换参数，证据进行合并。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 作为参数提供的证据方法取代加载程序提供的证据。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 当你使用方法的重载`Byte[]`参数加载通用对象文件格式 (COFF) 图像，证据继承自调用程序集。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 这适用于.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和后续版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 版和没有 SP1，当您使用的版本 1.1 中方法的重载`Byte[]`参数加载 COFF 映像，证据结合使用。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`并`Site`继承自调用程序集，并`Hash`和`StrongName`取自 COFF 程序集。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数和若要加载的 COFF 映像，请使用提供的证据。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 将忽略的调用程序集和 COFF 映像的证据。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 在 c + + 可执行文件上进行反射可能会引发。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 这很可能是由于 c + + 编译器去除重定位地址或`.reloc`从可执行文件的部分。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`地址为 c + + 可执行文件，请指定`/fixed:no`在链接时。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. > [!NOTE] > 如果这两个属性和属性设置，第一次尝试加载程序集使用的显示名称 (包括版本、 区域性和等等，所返回的属性)。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果找不到该文件，用于搜索该程序集。If the file is not found, is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用找到的程序集，与程序集匹配的显示名称。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果匹配失败，引发。If the match fails, a is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例实例化对象并使用它来加载`sysglobal.dll`程序集。The following example instantiates an object and uses it to load the `sysglobal.dll` assembly. 该示例然后显示程序集的公共类型的完整名称。The example then displays the full name of the assembly's public types. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly.Load#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.load/cs/Load2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly.Load#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.load/vb/Load2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集名称的长格式包含其简单名称 （如"系统"的 System.dll 程序集） 以及其版本、 区域性、 公钥标记和 （可选） 它的处理器体系结构。The long form of an assembly name consists of its simple name (such as "System" for the System.dll assembly) along with its version, culture, public key token, and optionally its processor architecture. 它对应于程序集的属性。It corresponds to the assembly's property. 下面的示例演示如何使用用于加载.NET Framework 4 的 System.dll 程序集的长名称。The following example illustrates the use of a long name to load the System.dll assembly for the .NET Framework 4. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.load/cs/load1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.load/vb/load1.vb#1)] 如果引发`assemblyString`指定完整的程序集名称和匹配的简单名称的第一个程序集具有不同的版本、 区域性或公钥标记。 is thrown if `assemblyString` specifies the full assembly name, and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a different version, culture, or public key token. 加载程序不会继续探测的其他程序集的简单名称相匹配。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. 是否将特定的权限授予程序集是基于证据的。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 程序集和安全证据的合并的规则如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 当你使用方法没有参数，则加载程序提供的证据加载程序集。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 当你使用方法替换参数，证据进行合并。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 作为参数提供的证据方法取代加载程序提供的证据。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 当你使用方法的重载`Byte[]`参数加载通用对象文件格式 (COFF) 图像，证据继承自调用程序集。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 这适用于.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和后续版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 版和没有 SP1，当您使用的版本 1.1 中方法的重载`Byte[]`参数加载 COFF 映像，证据结合使用。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`并`Site`继承自调用程序集，并`Hash`和`StrongName`取自 COFF 程序集。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数和若要加载的 COFF 映像，请使用提供的证据。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 将忽略的调用程序集和 COFF 映像的证据。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 在 c + + 可执行文件上进行反射可能会引发。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 这很可能是由于 c + + 编译器去除重定位地址或`.reloc`从可执行文件的部分。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`地址为 c + + 可执行文件，请指定`/fixed:no`在链接时。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，处理器体系结构添加到程序集标识，并可以指定为程序集名称字符串的一部分。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, processor architecture is added to assembly identity, and can be specified as part of assembly name strings. 例如，"ProcessorArchitecture = msil"。For example, "ProcessorArchitecture=msil". 但是，指定程序集名称的建议的方法是创建对象，并将其传递给适当的重载方法。However, the recommended way to specify an assembly name is to create an object and pass it to an appropriate overload of the method. 请参阅 。See . ## Examples 下面的示例加载给定其完全限定的名称的程序集，并列出了在指定程序集中包含的所有类型。The following example loads an assembly given its fully qualified name, and lists all the types contained in the specified assembly. 有关运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发`assemblyRef`指定完整的程序集名称和匹配的简单名称的第一个程序集具有不同的版本、 区域性或公钥标记。 is thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies the full assembly name, and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a different version, culture, or public key token. 加载程序不会继续探测的其他程序集的简单名称相匹配。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. 从.NET Framework 4 开始，因为默认情况下，禁用远程程序集中的代码执行也会引发如果`assemblyRef`指定远程程序集。Starting with .NET Framework 4, because execution of code in remote assemblies is disabled by default, a is also thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies a remote assembly. 若要启用从远程位置加载的代码的执行，可以使用[ `` ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)配置元素。To enable execution of code loaded from remote locations, you can use the [``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) configuration element. > [!NOTE] > 不要使用仅含属性集。Do not use an with only the property set. 属性不提供任何元素 （如名称或版本） 的程序集标识，因此加载不会发生根据负载通过标识规则，正如您期望从方法。The property does not supply any elements of the assembly identity (such as name or version), so loading does not occur according to load-by-identity rules, as you would expect from the method. 相反，使用负载从规则加载程序集。Instead, the assembly is loaded using load-from rules. 使用 load-from 上下文的缺点的信息，请参阅方法重载或[程序集加载的最佳实践](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md)。For information about the disadvantages of using the load-from context, see the method overload or [Best Practices for Assembly Loading](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md). 是否将特定的权限授予程序集是基于证据的。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 程序集和安全证据的合并的规则如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 当你使用方法没有参数，则加载程序提供的证据加载程序集。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 当你使用方法替换参数，证据进行合并。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 作为参数提供的证据方法取代加载程序提供的证据。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 当你使用方法的重载`Byte[]`参数加载通用对象文件格式 (COFF) 图像，证据继承自调用程序集。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 这适用于.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和后续版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 版和没有 SP1，当您使用的版本 1.1 中方法的重载`Byte[]`参数加载 COFF 映像，证据结合使用。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`并`Site`继承自调用程序集，并`Hash`和`StrongName`取自 COFF 程序集。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数和若要加载的 COFF 映像，请使用提供的证据。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 将忽略的调用程序集和 COFF 映像的证据。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 在 c + + 可执行文件上进行反射可能会引发。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 这很可能是由于 c + + 编译器去除重定位地址或`.reloc`从可执行文件的部分。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`地址为 c + + 可执行文件，请指定`/fixed:no`在链接时。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. > [!NOTE] > 如果这两个属性和属性设置，第一次尝试加载程序集使用的显示名称 (包括版本、 区域性和等等，所返回的属性)。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果找不到该文件，用于搜索该程序集。If the file is not found, is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用找到的程序集，与程序集匹配的显示名称。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果匹配失败，引发。If the match fails, a is thrown. 如果您调用方法不是一次在同一个程序集，但指定不同的证据，公共语言运行时不会引发更多因为相等性和完整性不同的证据规范不能为确定。If you call the method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一个成功的证据为使用的证据。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从.NET Framework 4 开始，在从远程位置加载的程序集执行代码的功能已禁用默认情况下，在调用`LoadFrom`方法会抛出。Starting with .NET Framework 4, the ability to execute code in assemblies loaded from remote locations is disabled by default, and the call to the `LoadFrom` method throws a . 若要加载的程序集和执行其代码，您必须：To load the assembly and execute its code, you must either: - 显式程序集创建一个沙盒。Explicitly create a sandbox for the assembly. (请参阅[如何： 运行沙盒中部分受信任的代码](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。)(See [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md).) - 在完全信任环境中运行程序集的代码，通过设置`enabled`的属性[``配置元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)到`true`。Run the assembly's code in full trust by setting the `enabled` attribute of the [`` configuration element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[``配置元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)一文。For more information, see the [`` configuration element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) article.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `assemblyFile`参数必须引用不包含转义符的 URI。The `assemblyFile` parameter must refer to a URI without escape characters. 此方法提供的 URI 中的所有无效字符的转义符。This method supplies escape characters for all invalid characters in the URI. > [!NOTE] > 不支持文件传输协议 (FTP)。File transfer protocol (FTP) is not supported. 如果为 URI 提供`assemblyFile`是 FTP 地址，则不会加载该程序集。If the URI supplied for `assemblyFile` is an FTP address, the assembly is not loaded. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. `assemblyFile` 可以是绝对或相对于当前目录，并将程序集加载到调用方的域。`assemblyFile` may be absolute or relative to the current directory, and the assembly is loaded into the domain of the caller. 程序集可以将加载到三个上下文中的一个，也可以在没有上下文的情况下加载：Assemblies can be loaded into one of three contexts, or can be loaded without context: - 加载上下文包含通过探测找到的程序集： 在 gac 中，在宿主程序集存储托管运行时，或在和的应用程序域。The load context contains assemblies found by probing: in the GAC, in a host assembly store if the runtime is hosted, or in the and of the application domain. 方法的大多数重载都将程序集加载到此上下文中。Most overloads of the method load assemblies into this context. - 加载位置上下文包含程序集为其用户提供了不包括在搜索通过探测的目录的路径。The load-from context contains assemblies for which the user provided a path not included in the directories searched by probing. 、 和 都是通过路径加载的方法的示例。, , and are examples of methods that load by path. 从.NET Framework 4 开始，如果的 URI`assemblyFile`指定远程位置，默认情况下，禁用程序集加载和`LoadFrom`方法会抛出。Starting with .NET Framework 4, if the URI of `assemblyFile` specifies a remote location, assembly loading is disabled by default, and the `LoadFrom` method throws a . 若要启用从远程位置加载的代码的执行，可以使用[ `` ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)配置元素。To enable execution of code loaded from remote locations, you can use the [``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) configuration element. - 仅限反射上下文包含与加载的程序集和方法; 在这些代码不能执行上下文。The reflection-only context contains assemblies loaded with the and methods; code in these contexts cannot be executed. - 如果用户生成或找到了程序集时，它不在任何上下文中。If the user generated or found the assembly, it is not in any context. 这适用于使用重载的加载程序集方法指定一个字节数组，包含程序集，并使用反射创建瞬态动态程序集发出和未保存到磁盘。This applies to assemblies loaded using overloads of the method that specify a byte array containing an assembly, and to transient dynamic assemblies created with reflection emit and not saved to disk. 加载位置上下文允许从探测中, 未包括的路径加载程序集，但若要找出并加载，因为路径信息由上下文维护该路径上也允许使用依赖项。The load-from context allows an assembly to be loaded from a path not included in probing, and yet allows dependencies on that path to be found and loaded because the path information is maintained by the context. 方法具有以下缺点。The method has the following disadvantages. 请考虑改用 。Consider using instead. - 如果已加载一个具有相同标识的程序集，则即使指定了不同的路径， 仍返回已加载的程序集。If an assembly with the same identity is already loaded, returns the loaded assembly even if a different path was specified. - 如果程序集加载了，以及更高版本中的加载上下文的程序集尝试按显示名称加载同一程序集，加载尝试将失败。If an assembly is loaded with , and later an assembly in the load context attempts to load the same assembly by display name, the load attempt fails. 这可能执行反序列化程序集时。This can occur when an assembly is de-serialized. - 如果程序集加载了，并且探测路径包括具有相同标识，而另一个位置的程序集， ，否则会发生其他意外的行为。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 需要对指定路径的 和 或 。 demands and , or , on the specified path. - 如果本机映像存在`assemblyFile`，不使用它。If a native image exists for `assemblyFile`, it is not used. 无法加载为非特定域的程序集。The assembly cannot be loaded as domain neutral. - 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不应用策略。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, policy is not applied. ## Examples 下面的示例加载给定的文件名或路径的程序集。The following example loads an assembly given its file name or path. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CPP/assembly.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CS/assembly.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/VB/assembly.vb#11)]

如果程序集加载了，并且探测路径包括具有相同标识，而另一个位置的程序集， ，否则会发生其他意外的行为。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不应用策略。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, policy is not applied. 是否将特定的权限授予程序集是基于证据的。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 程序集和安全证据的合并的规则如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 当你使用方法没有参数，则加载程序提供的证据加载程序集。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 当你使用方法替换参数，证据进行合并。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 作为参数提供的证据方法取代加载程序提供的证据。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 如果在同一程序集，但指定不同的证据不止一次调用此方法，公共语言运行时不会引发由于不能确定相等性和不同的证据规范的完整性。If you call this method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一个成功的证据为使用的证据。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数加载通用对象文件格式 (COFF) 图像，证据结合使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`并`Site`继承自调用程序集，并`Hash`和`StrongName`取自 COFF 程序集。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数和若要加载的 COFF 映像，请使用提供的证据。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 将忽略的调用程序集和 COFF 映像的证据。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `assemblyFile`参数必须引用不包含转义符的 URI。The `assemblyFile` parameter must refer to a URI without escape characters. 此方法提供的 URI 中的所有无效字符的转义符。This method supplies escape characters for all invalid characters in the URI. > [!NOTE] > 不支持文件传输协议 (FTP)。File transfer protocol (FTP) is not supported. 如果为 URI 提供`assemblyFile`是 FTP 地址，则不会加载该程序集。If the URI supplied for `assemblyFile` is an FTP address, the assembly is not loaded. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. `assemblyFile` 可以是绝对或相对于当前目录，并将程序集加载到调用方的域。`assemblyFile` may be absolute or relative to the current directory, and the assembly is loaded into the domain of the caller. 程序集可以将加载到三个上下文中的一个，也可以在没有上下文的情况下加载：Assemblies can be loaded into one of three contexts, or can be loaded without context: - 加载上下文包含通过探测找到的程序集： 在全局程序集缓存中，在宿主程序集存储托管运行时，或在和的应用程序域。The load context contains assemblies found by probing: in the global assembly cache, in a host assembly store if the runtime is hosted, or in the and of the application domain. 方法的大多数重载都将程序集加载到此上下文中。Most overloads of the method load assemblies into this context. - 加载位置上下文包含程序集为其用户提供了探测中未包括的路径。The load-from context contains assemblies for which the user provided a path that is not included in probing. 、 和 都是通过路径加载的方法的示例。, , and are examples of methods that load by path. 从.NET Framework 4 开始，如果的 URI`assemblyFile`指定远程位置，默认情况下，禁用程序集加载和`LoadFrom`方法会抛出。Starting with .NET Framework 4, if the URI of `assemblyFile` specifies a remote location, assembly loading is disabled by default, and the `LoadFrom` method throws a . 若要启用从远程位置加载的代码的执行，可以使用[ `` ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)配置元素。To enable execution of code loaded from remote locations, you can use the [``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) configuration element. - 仅限反射上下文包含与加载的程序集和方法; 在这些代码不能执行上下文。The reflection-only context contains assemblies loaded with the and methods; code in these contexts cannot be executed. - 如果用户生成或找到了程序集时，它不在任何上下文中。If the user generated or found the assembly, it is not in any context. 这适用于使用重载的加载程序集方法指定一个字节数组，包含程序集，并使用反射创建瞬态动态程序集发出和未保存到磁盘。This applies to assemblies loaded using overloads of the method that specify a byte array containing an assembly, and to transient dynamic assemblies created with reflection emit and not saved to disk. 加载位置上下文允许从探测中, 未包括的路径加载程序集，但若要找出并加载，因为路径信息由上下文维护该路径上也允许使用依赖项。The load-from context allows an assembly to be loaded from a path that is not included in probing, and yet allows dependencies on that path to be found and loaded because the path information is maintained by the context. 方法具有以下缺点。The method has the following disadvantages. 请考虑改用 。Consider using instead. - 如果已加载一个具有相同标识的程序集，则即使指定了不同的路径， 仍返回已加载的程序集。If an assembly with the same identity is already loaded, returns the loaded assembly even if a different path was specified. - 如果程序集加载了，以及更高版本中的加载上下文的程序集尝试按显示名称加载同一程序集，加载尝试将失败。If an assembly is loaded with , and later an assembly in the load context attempts to load the same assembly by display name, the load attempt fails. 对程序集进行反序列化时，可能发生这种情况。This can occur when an assembly is deserialized. - 如果程序集加载了，并且探测路径包括具有相同标识，而另一个位置的程序集， ，否则会发生其他意外的行为。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 需要对指定路径的 和 或 。 demands and , or , on the specified path. - 如果本机映像存在`assemblyFile`，不使用它。If a native image exists for `assemblyFile`, it is not used. 程序集不能以非特定于域的方式加载。The assembly cannot be loaded as domain-neutral. 程序集的加载程序提供的证据加载。The assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies.

仅限反射上下文包含与加载的程序集和方法; 在这些代码不能执行上下文。The reflection-only context contains assemblies loaded with the and methods; code in these contexts cannot be executed. - 如果用户生成或找到了程序集时，它不在任何上下文中。If the user generated or found the assembly, it is not in any context. 这适用于使用重载的加载程序集方法指定一个字节数组，包含程序集，并使用反射创建瞬态动态程序集发出和未保存到磁盘。This applies to assemblies loaded using overloads of the method that specify a byte array containing an assembly, and to transient dynamic assemblies created with reflection emit and not saved to disk. 加载位置上下文允许从探测中, 未包括的路径加载程序集，但若要找出并加载，因为路径信息由上下文维护该路径上也允许使用依赖项。The load-from context allows an assembly to be loaded from a path not included in probing, and yet allows dependencies on that path to be found and loaded because the path information is maintained by the context. 方法具有以下缺点。The method has the following disadvantages. 请考虑改用 。Consider using instead. - 如果已加载一个具有相同标识的程序集，则即使指定了不同的路径， 仍返回已加载的程序集。If an assembly with the same identity is already loaded, returns the loaded assembly even if a different path was specified. - 如果程序集加载了，以及更高版本中的加载上下文的程序集尝试按显示名称加载同一程序集，加载尝试将失败。If an assembly is loaded with , and later an assembly in the load context attempts to load the same assembly by display name, the load attempt fails. 对程序集进行反序列化时，可能发生这种情况。This can occur when an assembly is deserialized. - 如果程序集加载了，并且探测路径包括具有相同标识，而另一个位置的程序集， ，否则会发生其他意外的行为。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 需要对指定路径的 和 或 。 demands and , or , on the specified path. - 如果本机映像存在`assemblyFile`，不使用它。If a native image exists for `assemblyFile`, it is not used. 无法加载为非特定域的程序集。The assembly cannot be loaded as domain neutral. - 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不应用策略。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, policy is not applied. 是否将特定的权限授予程序集是基于证据的。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 程序集和安全证据的合并的规则如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 当你使用方法没有参数，则加载程序提供的证据加载程序集。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 当你使用方法替换参数，证据进行合并。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 作为参数提供的证据方法取代加载程序提供的证据。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 如果在同一程序集，但指定不同的证据不止一次调用此方法，公共语言运行时不会引发由于不能确定相等性和不同的证据规范的完整性。If you call this method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一个成功的证据为使用的证据。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数加载通用对象文件格式 (COFF) 图像，证据结合使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`并`Site`继承自调用程序集，并`Hash`和`StrongName`取自 COFF 程序集。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数和若要加载的 COFF 映像，请使用提供的证据。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 将忽略的调用程序集和 COFF 映像的证据。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored.

summary.span: 绕过某些安全检查，将程序集加载到加载源上下文中。

span.span: Loads an assembly into the load-from context, bypassing some security checks.

returns.span: 加载的程序集。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法加载操作系统已标记为已加载从 Web （例如，从 Internet 或 intranet 下载的临时文件） 的本地程序集。Use this method to load a local assembly that the operating system has flagged as having been loaded from the Web (for example, a temporary file that was downloaded from the Internet or intranet). 之前[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，此类程序集都要自动加载到沙盒应用程序域。Before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], such assemblies were automatically loaded into a sandboxed application domain. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，它们是以完全信任方式加载的。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], they are loaded with full trust. 作为使用此方法的替代方法，可以将应用[ <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)应用程序配置文件中。As an alternative to using this method, you can apply the [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md) in your application configuration file. 这会导致公共语言运行时，若要还原到的安全策略[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This causes the common language runtime to revert to the security policy of the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您使用这些解决方案，你必须是确定它是否可以安全地加载`assemblyFile`以完全信任。If you use either of these solutions, you must be certain that it is safe to load `assemblyFile` with full trust. 有关讨论加载上下文，包括加载位置上下文，请参阅方法重载。For a discussion of load contexts, including the load-from context, see the method overload.
